org.eclipse.cdt.core.options

Interface OptionMetadata<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the value type for the option
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOption

    public interface OptionMetadata<V>
    The option metadata provides the information needed to configure everything about the option except the option value itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V defaultValue()
      The default value for the option.
      String description()
      Widely describes the option purpose, intended to be used in UI.
      String identifer()
      The option identifier to use as a key to access the option value.
      String name()
      Briefly describes the option purpose, intended to be used in UI.
      Class<V> valueClass()
      The type of option value needed to perform type checks.

    • Method Detail

      • identifer

        String identifer()
        The option identifier to use as a key to access the option value. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the identifier

      • defaultValue

        V defaultValue()
        The default value for the option. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the option's default value

      • name

        String name()
        Briefly describes the option purpose, intended to be used in UI. Must not be null and should be localized. Should not be blank.
        Returns:
        the option's name

      • description

        String description()
        Widely describes the option purpose, intended to be used in UI. Must not be null and should be localized. May be blank.
        Returns:
        the option's description

      • valueClass

        Class<V> valueClass()
        The type of option value needed to perform type checks. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the value class
